message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $115. It's a great deal for you, and I'm sure you'll find it very useful.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $105, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $105 isn't quite where I need to be. I'm willing to come down to $110. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you say?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $110 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $107.50, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
